unnormalised: ## Level Up Your Insta Game: Brand Collabs 101!
normalised: ## Level Up Your Insta Game: Brand Collabs one hundred and one!

unnormalised: Hey guys! So, you wanna be a social media rockstar, raking in the likes (and maybe even some *dough*)? Then listen up, because we’re diving deep into the world of brand collaborations. Think of it as your express ticket to influencer heaven.
normalised: Hey guys! So, you wanna be a social media rockstar, raking in the likes (and maybe even some *dough*)? Then listen up, because we’re diving deep into the world of brand collaborations. Think of it as your express ticket to influencer heaven.

unnormalised: Brand collabs are basically when a brand (like, say, Bikanervala or maybe even IIT Delhi sponsoring a tech event) partners with you, the influencer, to promote their product or service. It's a win-win! They get exposure to your awesome audience, and you get paid (or get free stuff!). Imagine getting free gulab jamuns just for posting a cute pic!
normalised: Brand collabs are basically when a brand (like, say, Bikanervala or maybe even I I T Delhi sponsoring a tech event) partners with you, the influencer, to promote their product or service. It's a win-win! They get exposure to your awesome audience, and you get paid (or get free stuff!). Imagine getting free gulab jamuns just for posting a cute pic!

unnormalised: But how do you actually snag these sweet deals? First, build your brand. Find your niche. Are you a foodie? A fashionista? A travel guru exploring the Himalayas? Whatever it is, own it! Post consistently. High-quality photos are a must! Nobody wants to see blurry selfies, right? And engage with your followers. Reply to comments, run polls, be a real person!
normalised: But how do you actually snag these sweet deals? First, build your brand. Find your niche. Are you a foodie? A fashionista? A travel guru exploring the Himalayas? Whatever it is, own it! Post consistently. High-quality photos are a must! Nobody wants to see blurry selfies, right? And engage with your followers. Reply to comments, run polls, be a real person!

unnormalised: Next, start reaching out to brands that align with your style. Don’t be afraid to slide into their DMs. Prepare a killer pitch. Tell them who you are, what you do, and why YOU are the perfect person to represent their brand. Remember that influencer event in Mumbai on 26/01/2023? Networking GOLD!
normalised: Next, start reaching out to brands that align with your style. Don’t be afraid to slide into their DMs. Prepare a killer pitch. Tell them who you are, what you do, and why YOU are the perfect person to represent their brand. Remember that influencer event in Mumbai on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three? Networking GOLD!

unnormalised: Also, don't undervalue yourself! Know your worth. How much are you going to charge per post? Per story? Negotiate! This isn't charity, it's business. And always, ALWAYS disclose your sponsored content. Transparency is key, my friends. We want to keep it real, like Diljit Dosanjh at a chaat corner at 16:00 hrs.
normalised: Also, don't undervalue yourself! Know your worth. How much are you going to charge per post? Per story? Negotiate! This isn't charity, it's business. And always, ALWAYS disclose your sponsored content. Transparency is key, my friends. We want to keep it real, like Diljit Dosanjh at a chaat corner at four P.M.

unnormalised: Remember that Insta story you did on your trip to Goa last Diwali (24/10/2022)? That’s the kind of authentic content brands crave. So go out there, create amazing content, and get ready to collaborate! Your DMs might just start buzzing with opportunity. Good luck, and namaste!
normalised: Remember that Insta story you did on your trip to Goa last Diwali (twenty fourth october two thousand and twenty two)? That’s the kind of authentic content brands crave. So go out there, create amazing content, and get ready to collaborate! Your DMs might just start buzzing with opportunity. Good luck, and namaste!
